name: stix
label: STIX
description: Structured Threat Information Expression, is a language and serialization format for exchanging threat information in cyberspace. Using this connector we can Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file and also Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX specification

operations.title: Extract Indicators From STIX File
operations.description: Extract indicators from the submitted STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1

parameters.title: Maximum Age (in Days)

parameters.tooltip: Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified. If an expiry is specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.
parameters.description: Default age for the feeds. The indicator expires on 'valid_until' date unless a different expiry is specified. If an expiry is specified, the indicator will be marked expired on valid_from + expiry.

operations.title: Export Indicators In STIX Spec Format
operations.description: Exports selected indicators from FortiSOAR in a valid STIX spec, which can then be downloaded as a STIX file. Supports STIX 2.0 and STIX 2.1
